title: Chris Hemsworth's daring actress wife Elsa Pataky rides dirt bikes with the couple's three children
text:
Elsa Pataky showed off her adventurous side when she went dirt bike riding with her three kids on Tuesday.

The 43-year-old actress shared photos and videos on her Instagram Stories, showing herself and her three children, daughter India, seven, and twin sons Sasha and Tristan, five, riding around their sprawling Byron Bay property.

While Elsa's husband-of-nine-years, Chris Hemsworth, didn't appear in the videos, the Tidelands star seemed to be having a great time with the couple's kids struggling to keep up with their speed demon mum.

Scroll down for video

On your bikes: Elsa Pataky (left) showed off her adventurous side when she went dirt bike riding with her three kids on Tuesday

After putting safety gear on one of the twins, Elsa then joined her spirited children as they rode laps around the property.

A man - who sounded a lot like Chris, 36 - could be heard chuckling as he watched the young family race around on their bikes.

'Look at her, she's, like, the fastest... I wonder where they got the speed from?' he remarked with a laugh.

Ride on: The 43-year-old actress shared photos and videos on her Instagram Stories, showing herself and her three children, daughter India, seven, and twin sons Sasha and Tristan, five, riding around their sprawling Byron Bay property

Little daredevil: The daring kids showed no fear as they rode around on the grass, with one of the twins even jumping up on his bike

But while Elsa raced ahead of her kids, the protective mum regularly peered back to make sure they were all okay.

The daring kids showed no fear as they rode around on the grass, with one of the twins even jumping up on his bike.

'No fear!!' Elsa captioned the video of the little boy.

Was he there? A man - who sounded a lot like Chris Hemsworth - could be heard chuckling as he watched the young family race around on their bikes

Their family ride came just weeks after Chris was seen picking up three Yamaha Peewee 50 dirt bikes for his kids during a stop at a dealership on the Gold Coast.

The hulking actor was accompanied by his dad, Craig, who helped Chris load the bikes onto the back of his Toyota ute.

They also picked up a series of accessories, with both Chris and Craig making their way back to the car with their arms loaded up.
